place_description: A social destination featuring duckpin bowling, dozens of classic pinball machines & many more ‘old school’ entertainment options along with high-quality cocktails and crafts beers served daily. Come Play!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to visit when the weather is nice so you can also enjoy the outdoor activities. There are so many fun games to play and the drinks are so creative and fun! Great atmosphere!
I really want to like this place. But there are so many children here. Ruins the experience.
This is such a great place for adults and children. Lots of activities and fun things to do. Duckpin bowling was awesome and a great selection of drinks from the bar!
So many fun arcade games! Free skeeball too! Great selection of drinks. They have Duck pin bowling, ping pong, and pinball.
Love this place!!! Zya and DaRon are the best!  Thank you for giving us the best service!!
Great place to bring your kids and be a big kid yourself. You can outside food and they also have food trucks outside. Great for birthday gatherings. The drinks at the bar were good.
Was a cool and chilled. Great atmosphere for all. Lots of engaging games.
So fun.  Retro arcade with new age games.  Had an awesome time.  Excellent drink selection also.
Love this place! We go here to play cards most Wednesdays and the staff is amazing!

We stopped in for a quick drink and I wish we had planned to stay longer...it was definitely a vibe! Bartenders were great, drinks were delish! We were even able to get some really good mocktails for our expecting momma friends. Loved the atmosphere, games were fun and the oversized swings were a hit with the crew! The food trucks outside were also a plesant surprise! All in all we had a great time, we would definitely visit again!
Kay is the sweetest!
We love this place! Both for the kids in the day time and for adult outings on the weekend nights!
No food but they had food trucks! Great atmosphere for date night and group outings !
Fun place, gets very busy
Great place to hangout with a group of friends
Had an amazing time, drinks weren't too bad and the food trucks outside are worth checking out for sure the birria tacos were amazing
Half the bar closed for private event so no pins just mechanical no thank you

I love a good day drinking bar. Came on a Saturday afternoon and unfortunately there were just too many kids running around, not being supervised by their parents. Felt more like a kids arcade than a bar atmosphere wise. Couldnt go to the restroom or order another drink without a kid almost bumping into you. However the service was great and the drinks were good! Most likely won't go there anymore during the day but it's a cool spot.
Great place to party with the fam any afternoon!
Visited pins recently. I had a stellar experience! The bartender, Ari, was so accommodating & professional! She made me feel right at home & I will be visiting again because of her. Thanks pins!
Nate was so kind here! Very accommodating to our group during Duckpins and even gave us free dog treats for our pups back home! highly recommend a visit here, the best!!!
Very fun and great place to hang with friends
Loved it here

This place is awesome. Good drink selection with pinball, arcade, and various other games available for entertainment. Check out the website; it's too hard to describe everything here. There's like 30 or classic arcade games - Donkey Kong, Frogger, Dig Dug, Galaga, etc. I didn't want to leave.
Super cool retro arcade and bowling. Cool atmosphere and staff are awesome.

Part one of my birthday adventure: Pins is always a good time. I didn't get into as much shenanigans as last time when I was yelled at for getting up high in one of their swings and kicking the light-I apologize. This time I kept it chill, just playing arcade games and foosball, which my friend was concerningly good at. The place is nice and spacious and the slide is always fun to go down. I want to try going down head first some time but I'm not sure if it's a good idea.
Really cool venue!
Fun place to go hang out, play games, drink and be social.  Food is by Food trucks but you can bring food in as well
Always one of my favorite spots. One of the best Pins mechanical we have ever been to. 100000% recommend you try this place.

The place is nice people too but I'm never drinking there again it's the second time I buy drinks here and wake up sick, me and my friends went yesterday and we all woke up with acid and throwing up, they're not selling good quality alcohol probably something expired or something idk ask the Bartender to check everything first be careful is the second time this happened
The drinks were really good! And bartenders were super friendly! Loved how much activities there were to do.
We had so much fun on our date night! Duckpin bowling was great! Loved the outside area. Can't wait for the location in Raleigh to open!
This is really cool spot in Southend . All games are free and you just buy your drinks. Love it. I think the bowling is $25 though.
Very fun experience. Always have a fun crowd. So many games to have fun with friends

Pins Mechanical Co is an absolute gem! From the moment we walked in, it was a nostalgic trip back to our younger days. The retro arcade games, pinball machines, and even the miniature bowling lanes made this place an unforgettable experience.

The staff were all incredibly friendly and helpful, especially the bartender who went out of her way to make our visit special by giving us a free Coke--such a kind gesture! My friends and I had a blast and genuinely felt like we were 20 years old again, reliving the best parts of our childhood with a modern twist.

Thank you for being one of the highlights of my recent visit to North Carolina. I can't wait to come back next time I'm in town!"

How does that sound? Let me know if you'd like to adjust anything!
Cool's work event space to gather and  drink .
Devry was very funny and knew a lot about the environment :)
Devry was great. Very funny!

This is going to be a long one I apologize! During the day we would rate Pins a 1/5at night a 3/5!

TLDR: Day: it's worse than Chuck-E-Cheese! Night: Music is way too loud! Machines can be janky!

My rating expectation: overall a 3 to not hurt the overall score too bad as we still love this place just a lot less! Service is a 5/5 everyone who works there does such an amazing job! Atmosphere is a 2/5 right in the middle of how I feel about day and night!

We found this place about 3 years ago or so and LOVED coming like every other weekend! This all really sucks as Pins is really the only pin ball place in Charlotte!

Let's start with the day 1/5:

We haven't been to Pins in about a month as the music is a big turn off for us we have to be in the right type of mood to even think about tolerating it. (More on why with the night section) we were so excited to check out the atmosphere and hopefully start coming more like we used too every other week sometime every week!
We were very surprised and shocked at what we walked into I felt like I had stepped into a Chuck-E-Cheese. There were so many kids and we knew you guys allowed children past a certain debatable time at night. (More in the night section) but we were expecting day drinking and pin ball not a full blown playground! There was maybe 3 machines open to play and with all the ruckus it makes me wonder why a lot of the machines have seemed janky the last 5 times we've been. So unfortunately we won't be back during the day!

Now for the night 3/5:
The service is always a 5/5 however sometime during the spring of last year the music has been ungodly loud we normally can't hear ourselves think I normally leave with a headache! It's not even that great of music either. I've also seen children still there as late as 11pm which is a major turn off as i didn't enjoy stepping away from the bar only to see a child late at night! The pinball machines have always been kinda janky the last five times we've been some stuck or just won't work! We will overall still come at nights just once every in a blue moon! As the atmosphere changed and I'd unfortunately no longer for us!

What we would love to see:
Child free days (not everyday but like a special once a month)
Lower music volumes (literally only a few notches down)

Also if you ever wanna sell a machine I might be interested!
Tons of fun activities- it was a little hectic on a Sunday, lots of kids running around.
Great place to be a kid again!

We really had a good time here until the server after we paid for the one game came and told us we had to leave because they had a function going on in 20 minutes. She never told us that when we paid for the lane. Also they do not serve food but you can bring your own. It really was a lovely experience there.

It was super busy on a Saturday evening. There are lots of arcade games, the bar had good seasonal drinks and overall was a good experience. However It was surprising to see a lot of kids. I tried the indoor slide and it was fun!! There's limited parking so you can walk a couple blocks from the light rail station.
Great place for games and drinks

When I was there, I was on the swing and somebody picked up my full beer at 1:45.
When I went inside to tell them, they gave me my money back, but I wanted my beer. I then went back outside to tell my friends what happened to tell them it's time to leave and all the doors were locked and I couldn't get back inside.
Very unwelcoming atmosphere. Very frustrating I will never go back.
Nice family places.
Love this place. Great nitric. Great drinks. Fun games.
a lot of the time i have a hard time ordering drinks because im picky but christina made things so easy for me and my drink was phenomenal. hope she's working next time i come back
Muito bom pra levar crianca

To start off with, i would highly recommend if you are coming to hang out at the bar and play games. The service from all the staff was excellent, always polite and quick! the cocktails were really dialed in as well. Really well-rounded on that front for sure.

My wife's company had their office Christmas party here. To preface, I try to put constructive feedback in my reviews and leave out things that cant be controlled.

My main issues were that the food was mediocre, drinking water was "over the bar" only, the skee ball machines which occupied a large portion of the event space didn't work correctly (scoring was almost completely broken), and the event space was not effectively access restricted.

Multiple people not involved with the event wandered through, one of whom appeared to be homeless and disoriented. Some people were even playing the arcade games in our event space. Adding a few more signs that say "reserved for event- do not enter" would probably be helpful, as well as making the tape barriers more obstructive.

Water being over-the-bar only seems petty, but other bars in south end even have self-serve water set out for regular evenings. Unless this is some health code issue, in my opinion a water cooler would have bumped this up a notch.

And finally the food- frankly it left a lot to be desired. There were some cold cut sliders, but apart from that It felt like a lot of the dishes were trying too hard. The bbq meatballs were yummy; other than that there was nothing really simple, no American staples like popcorn chicken or pulled pork, and some dishes like the teriyaki shrimp skewers were flat out bad in my opinion. Instead of normal fruit salad, there were assorted semi-soft cheeses added onto the ends of the fruit skewers, one of which was a classically "smelly" variety. I and other event goers i talked to mainly wanted simple, good food.
Nice place to hangout.  Food is not available there other than the food trucks outside.  They allow outside food which is good.
Super packed and no parking. It's not actual bowling it's a softball size ball with pins on a string. Parking was horrendous.
Cool place for group hang outs
Had a great time it's a place for fun

Planned on going here for a wedding after party tonight because supposedly no reservations needed at any time and of course we try to go there tonight and it's booked for a private party so which is it do y'all book private parties or do you not?

This an awesome social house . Kids can hang till 9p or so.
Great and friendly staff walking the floor making sure everyone is ok.

Will return

9.5/10
horrible service

First time playing duck pin (bowling which is much easier on your hand, arm and shoulder) and it rocked! To play pinball and Foosball it was a $1/game. The arcade games were all free. Also, cool slide for children and adults and swings! Let's just say it was outright fun! Highly recommend and looking forward to going back again!

Great place to bring the family. I brought my family and we had a blast. They have a lot of old school games like Pac-Man and Galaga. They also have 2 stations of Sega Genesis and super Nintendo with classic games. Overall a great place and will be coming back.

Aspen Earley connected us with Jessica Lancaster to have a company event at Pin's Mechanical which, everyone loved! The lounge and lanes reserved were very accommodating and fun. With the food trucks on site and games this was a great family friendly atmosphere. I would highly recommend any type of event at this location.
Drinks are on the pricy side but it's definitely worth it if your with your homies

This place is super unprofessional and rude, they have a partnered truck outside where they serve food, we ordered a sweet tea, and they would not let us inside with it. Lady outside she doesn't care, to leave as more people will come. Super unprofessional.

The staff is ridiculous stupid, they have a food truck outside that is affiliated with them. You can bring food but they won't let you bring drinks from the truck... Super dirty place will never go there again
Ashley gave me a birthday shot! and Catie sold me an incredible game of bowling!
Never played duckpin bowling before and it was a lot of fun. Also enjoyed the patio beer pong. Duckpin is free on Monday btw

Pins is so much fun, whenever i have family or friends visit from out of town we all go here. I love the Duckpin Bowling which is so much more fun in my opinion. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Side note* I respect that an arcade usually draws the attention of kids however since it is a BAR I thought parents would just take their kids to big air or something more appropriate and a lot of parents have been drinking and don't seem tocare if they run around. * I wish they served like personal pizzas, burgers/fries, mozzarella sticks. Nothing crazy. They do have partnerships with local food trucks so some good options come around from time to time.

I love coming here with my husband. We came here once for a date night and also came one time to host friends from out of town. It is a little pricy. The drinks from the bar are definitely on the more expensive side. I believe we paid about $30 for 2 drinks. There is an arcade area with options of free stuff to do.
Such a fun place to waste an afternoon and the rooftop views are beautiful
Definitely good vibe there

Love all the difference game options. The outdoor hangout area is super chill and fun. I love the swings! When it's cold, they have the fire pit on and it's nice just to sit and have a good time with friends. When they stop serving food late at night, you could order pizza that's about 2 mins away.
One of my favorite places! Drinks are amazing, music is good and fun games to play!
A zoo on a Saturday afternoon. Little kids screaming and throwing things everywhere. Basically Chuck E. Cheese but with alcohol

Attended a 40th birthday party here on Labor Day weekend. During our stay, a handful of drunk kids spilled drinks and broke glasses on a metal set of stairs above our table, spilling their drinks and glass into our food and drinks.  Poor experience but was told my entire bill would be covered by the manager.

Fast forward a few weeks and the charge was still on my credit card. Called and left messages but they never answered or returned my call.

Challenged the bill on my credit card and Pins prompted responded to the credit card company saying the charge was mine to pay.

Poor customer service and a worse overall experience after being covered in liquor and glass.

First time visiting  this establishment ...very well laid out, free classic  Arcade video games, awesome atmosphere and  Krystal our  server was  Awesome, Krystal made sure we had everything we
needed,She would be sure to check on us during the night as we moved around the Venue. 5 star experience .
For certain will be coming back for the Halloween  Bash....
Krystal made Pins an amazing experience! She was so personable and accommodating. The atmosphere was unmatched and the drinks are reasonably priced
Krystal did an Amazing job hosting our table. She is full of energy and provided great service.
Very fun atmosphere. Lots of games and things to do. Great bar staff! Even when it was busy, I didn't wait long for a drink. Definitely go down the slide if you visit!

Came here for a birthday party brought a $50. bottle of Tito's as a gift. Even though it was gift wrapped they wouldn't let me bring it in. Security said they would hold it at the front desk. Went back to get it after an hour when we were leaving and someone had stolen it. Don't trust anyone that works there.

A great place w/ plenty to do that is easy on the pockets (Date Night ). No kids unaccompanied after 9pm. Great staff. The drinks are awesome w/ specials everyday. Majority of the games are free. Duckpin bowling is $9/per person per game on Fri-Sun & $7 any other day I believe. All pinball is $1. They don't serve food but there are always a couple of food trucks outside. (Gouda Fries is the food truck I visited last, great choices if you're into fries with different types of toppings).
Was my first time here. Seems pretty decent I'll make sure to visit again.
No food. Great drinks and activities. The slide was fun and Kay makes the best drinks. Had the smoke & mirrors and a lemon drop with tequila. Kay did her thing, go see her.
Kayyyyyyyyyyy! Thank you for taking care of us! Pins Mechanical you got a keeper! Drinks were ON POINT! TIL next time

Was there last weekend. Had a great time. Our bartender Jess was super friendly and had great suggestions. Never had been before and she was super helpful to make it easy and fun. Would come back anytime.
A very fun place to hangout or office meetups. Lot of game options
Cool as atmosphere
Great spot, Delaney was so helpful and made our experience fantastic!!
Bartenders Jess & Tj were amazing!!! Great attitudes and friendly n professional atmosphere!!
Such a fun spot with a ton of fun things to do.
Having a issue with my bill an have called twice only to leave a message an not get a call back. Very disappointing.

Pins has a wide and fantastic selection of drinks and activities! Staff is friendly and efficient, atmosphere is one of the best in the city, and I always seem to bump into old friends here. Definitely one of my favorite spots and I'll always find myself losing track of time!
Muy buen lugar fuera venden comida hay muchos juegos, puedes pasar un gran rato divertido y conocer amigos los tragos economicos me parecio una gran experiencia
Good beer selection.  It was a nice trip down memory lane playing all the 80's video games. Got some kind of red stain on my pants using the slide so be careful.
Super fun bar! They have swings and a ton of old Arcade games. Not all the games work properly, but the atmosphere and drinks make up for that, definitely worth a visit!

Fun for all game bar with small pin  bowling, tons of games, lounge areas, massive selection of drinks, and a ton of room to play and frolic. Good meeting spot for larger groups and a staple for night life in South End Charlotte

Unlike other arcade bars, this is an arcade first and a bar second. Lots of fun. Duckpin bowling, pinball and free games like ski ball, and classic arcade machine. A slide some swings outside and open air space.  I saw a smash tournament on old CRTs while I was there.

The service was great. The bartender made my drink and ran out do ginger ale so it wasn't right, but without my saying, she remade my drink and offered me both rather than tossing the first. Free drink!

I didn't try any food here so I cannot attest to that. I and I think most people come for games and refreshments.

Very nice crowd! Got to meet a lot of young and social people. Bartenders were friendly. Awesome spot to play games. The wait time for the pin bowling was rather long. Some of the arcade games were broken (free) we enjoyed the drinks but did not eat here. The fact they allow dogs around the establishment was a huge plus! Good time and a near perfect experience.

Pins is handsdown one of my favorite bars around. Theres always so much to do and so many drinks to order. I just went this week for my first time back in a couple years and WOW have they improved their entertainment. Plenty of pinball which is my favorite. They are not known as a pinball hall so their machines dont have the best care given to them and some tables have non-working gamemodes. They have games or activities for everybody. Plenty of seating/couches. Free cabinet arcade games, cornhole is free, etc. Duckpin is a little costly but for what you get (full 10 frames) and up to 7 people per lane, its worth the price. Drinks are priced pretty average for the CLT area. Theres so much to do for anybody and you cant have a bad night here. They also have a great upstairs patio with firepits, another bar, and a fantastic view of the city and sunset at the right time. Worth the drive from Rock Hill to visit. Love Pins

Arcades are FREE
Bowling is just $7
Amazing place

Food truck outside ruled. Luna pizza.
This place has fun activities like bowling on strings. They have the big jenga, corn hole, trash can pong, arcade with absolute hits, and some other things.
I bowled and though it was more fun than big ball bowling 
They have a bar and you can bring in food.
Kids out at 9pm.
Loved it

The activities, facility, and staff are 5 stars.  Time flies when you are having fun and that's a definite here.  I knew this going in, but the elephant in the room is no food...  it just doesn't make sense.  Yes, there was a food truck with limited options.  Yes, it was a pain to order and carry in and have no plates or utensils.  Yes, there are food options closeby.  If you go to Pins Mech, I'd just resolve to having no food plans, it'll keep you at 5 stars.

I recently visited Pins Mechanical Co. and had a fantastic time! This place is a hotspot for the younger generation, offering a wide range of activities that everyone can enjoy. My favorite was the bowling, which is not only fun but also reasonably priced compared to other bowling alleys. There are so many other games to play, including ping pong, corn hole, swings, a large enclosed slide, and various arcade games. The atmosphere is lively and perfect for hanging out with friends.

One of the best features is the bar, which allows you to bring your drinks to the play area. It's great to be able to enjoy a drink while playing games with friends. However, there is one drawback - after 8 PM, they require a physical ID for entry. This policy can be inconsistent, as sometimes they accept virtual IDs, but other times they don't. Unfortunately, on my last visit, my friend was not allowed in because she only had a virtual ID, which was quite disappointing.

Despite this issue, I still think Pins Mechanical Co. is an excellent place to hang out with friends and have a good time. The variety of activities and the fun atmosphere make it worth visiting. Just make sure to bring a physical ID if you're planning to stay late!

I contacted the event planner (Cash) to book the rooftop for my birthday event. She first provided me information and the contract. I told her I would visit the location to confirm with area I would like to reserve. At this point everything I asked for was available. I was there previously when another party had the rooftop and hosted their own DJ, just like I requested which was approved. The next morning I contact her back to confirm the rooftop and she was a different person. She proceeded to tell me that was too expensive for me and I couldn't have a DJ among other things. I cancelled everything immediately and emailed the corporate managers. No one got back to me from the entire company. I was disappointed yet not surprise. Do not use the place for any events. I luckily found a location to accommodate my needs and I paid more because of how well I was treated!
Always a blast and the slide was a nice addition!
Deja and Jess were amazing best service in charlotte great attitude and insight to what beers are the best going back often
First time here and just want to shoutout deja for the amazing customer service! Will be back soon
Great place to hangout and have an awesome time. Free arcade games are a definite plus. First time trying duck pin bowling and I loved it. The slide is also a nice touch
Had a great time here with my 8 year old son! Lots of fun things to do bowling  pin ball machines, video games!
SKYLA WAS THE BEST SERVER IVE EVER ENCOUNTERED TREATED OUR GROUP OF 20 people with respect and phenomenal service very attentive 10/10.

What was once my favorite adult social bar, is now the new Chucky Cheese. I really thought the whole intention behind this place was a "fun social house style bar with games and even a slide(!) for adults to feel like kids again!" Well the last time we went, my friend and I struggled to even go down the slide because there were about 8 tiny children running UP it. We sat at the top for a good 5 minutes using our best teacher voices to warn them we were coming down and make sure they were out of the way. And yet I still pummeled one over on my way down??? This child smacked their head and ran off crying!! Nah. Not the vibe. We also couldn't play any other games in the place other than the pinball machines because they were all taken over by 10 year-olds. The wait for duck-pin was 2.5 hours! So last stop was to wait for a turn at playing skee ball, but lo-and-behold we also couldn't do that because the children literally wouldn't share a turn when we asked them. It's wild out there y'all. This is truly the new Chucky Cheese. Have fun.
I wasn't there long, but I want to go back k when I have more time.  I'm an 80's "girl" & love all the classic games! So cool! Definitely a fun place to go.

Cool place to hang out and play some old school video games. The duckpin bowling was fun as well. We had about an hour wait until a lane freed up. But plenty to do while we waited. Parking was an issue because both lots were full (Sunday afternoon). Luckily we found a spot a few blocks down the street.
AWFUL! They made us wait over 1 hr 1/2 for bucket pong WHEN NO ONE WAS PLAYING!

Fun old school games, modern bowling with smaller pins and fast pace- great for all ages, beer selection is great! Caution though, there's no food served inside this place and you have to go outside to a couple of food trucks- really sucks on a hot charlotte summer day! Some of the retro arcade games are broken and need replaced. Overall it was worth it and will be back many times!
I didn't have any food during my visit but played several arcade and pinball machines. All games were well maintained and I didn't have any issues.

We had a fun night out here with duckpin bowling, free arcade games, and ping pong (though you need to bring cash for the ping pong ball). The pinball machines looked fun, but they only take cash, which we didn't have. Adding contactless payment would be a great improvement. We finished off the night enjoying the rooftop deck. Definitely recommend this place!

10/10 would recommend this establishment to anyone looking for a fun time and fabulous drinks! My friends and I come here all the time and the company couldn't be better. Not to mention there is never a lack of activities!!! Go to pins, you won't regret it!!!
Had an incident here; manager contacted me and was supposed to ship something out to me. They never did. That was a month ago.

Technically, there's no food. However, they do have food trucks outside. There are plenty of games for you and your friends to play. There's a giant slide for everyone to ride. The drinks are good, but sweet. I really enjoyed duck bowling. Parking was a chore. There's a parking lot, but it fills up quickly. Great times!
Extremely Fun & Exciting place for adults! Games, Bowling, Food Trucks, Beer, & more! They even have an INDOOR SLIDE & SWINGS for ADULTS!! LOVE IT!
This place is really bad. Half of the machines don't work, the slide is very sticky, nothing is clean, the swings are very poor. I will never recommend this place!!!

This place is amazing! We're here on a trip from out of town and I wish we had something like this at home. The drinks are fantastic. I don't drink alcohol and I love that the mocktails are not an afterthought at the bar. They taste great. The prices for activities and games are reasonable. The staff members are very helpful and friendly. Duckpin was so much fun! We loved the massive light brite and the slide is so cool! We'll come back again if we're in town! Also, we loved that it's 21+ after 9. Went from a Chuck E Cheese vibe to adult summer camp.
Cool place to hang out & have fun. Lots of cool games to play.
Fun atmosphere and kid and dog friendly during the day
Food trucks are great, games are awesome.  Excellent beverage selection.

Stopped by Pins while visiting Charlotte. Staff was very friendly and welcoming. Bartenders provided recommendations based on what I said I like.   Noticed the manager Josuel was very supportive of his staff. He also explained how the games work since it was my first time visiting. Lots of cute places to take photos! Will be back!

A great experience of various games. Very creative and so many games to spend quality evening time with friends and family. Loved the energy around the place. Bar, food, music and games - what else do you possibly need on a weekend or a holiday or a birthday! Definitely a must go for the choices they have!
I had the pleasure of stumbling into Pins Mechanical and was immediately greeted. The Manager Josuel recommended some great drinks. And the atmosphere was super fun. Had an amazing time.
Legitimately my favorite place in Charlotte. I go out of my way to visit everytime I'm in town.

I was in town on a short visit with some family and had no clue where we should go for some exciting entertainment,  I looked this awesome place up and we gave it a try , the games were fun , food was good and the bar didn't break the bank... we will back soon.
Great place

Wow, what a great place place for a grown-up to become a kid again with a beer in hand!  If you are looking for a place to hang out, have some fun, and choose from a large selection of beers, this is the place. Staff was amazing and friendly. Large selection of old-school video games and pinball machines. Food trucks are where we got our food. I will be back again!

This is the most dysfunctional reservation system I've ever experienced. We waited over half an hour for the 'patio pong' when we instructed the team members that there wasn't anyone using the indoor pong and we didn't want to use the outdoor space. There was no one using it from the jump. Complete chaos and dysfunction. In the screenshot attached, you can see we were still fourth in line and no one was using the indoor pong space.

This place was with best! So many fun games. Aspen was the most fabulous manager! She gave me great recommendations on where to go in Charlotte for dining, bars, and other activities!  This place is friendly which is an added bonus (I wouldn't recommend them being there past 8PM; they do get the boot at 9.)
Very good drinks, cool slide!
Lots of games to play. Employees are nice and customer service is great.
Forgot to close out my tap and they hit me with outrageous charges on my card. Shame on y'all crooks!!  They don't have to worry about us coming back over there!
Had a great experience here. Management took nice care of me and made me feel welcome! My sister loves the place as well. Would go again!

Fun environment but security was a little upright. Drinks were very, very watery. I've never had such watered down drinks. My party and I each tried different things and they were all poured very weak. Especially for $15 a drink.
We had an event there this weekend and it was the perfect vibe for a party. Sara at the bar was so so helpful throughout the night -- she went above and beyond to make sure we had a great experience.
Lindsay is the BEST server ever !!! Great service.
i had a great time and enjoyed the atmosphere, the security guard jean was being helpful since it was my first time coming here and jean was awesome
i had an amazing time and experience here , Jean at the front was awesome and very helpful!!

They don't accept government issued IDs. They decide to accept whoever they like in. Fake IDs are okay as long as they can see the emblems with light but they won't let people in with actual IDs. A joke of an establishment. Manager has a bad attitude. And they are too cheap to purchase ID scanners.
Would not recommend 0/10, the drinks and staff were horrible very displeased with the experience I had here
Gabby was with the quickness . Sis took our order turned the corner and was RIGHT BACK didn't have us waiting long at all and def had good energy ! Great customer service

The best night out with friends and our kids that I've had in forever. We played arcade games all night, bowled, and I even got to play super Mario world on one of the consoles in the back while drinking a beer.
Great place! Even though it's technically a bar it's super family friendly!  I've come  here around 5 times and every time it does not fail!
Devry and Jean are dope and top flight security
Devry and Jean were great at the front door
Best place for relaxing, fun, and drinks! It has everything!
Fun place for families
Lots to do. Fun!
Lindsay was the absolute best.!!!
Autumn was such a great bartender! She made amazing drinks. Thank you!
Lindsay is the best!
Lindsay is the best!
Dev and Jean best security. Marco was the best server
Shout out to Dev, Marc and Jean. Best security
Dev, Marc and Jean were great

They beat or met their reservation times,
bar tenders are very nice, games are fun! Only negative... very loud! But you can go sit outside if it gets too loud!
Great staff! Lively atmosphere!

Nice concept.  Got here around 9:15 on Saturday night.  Ordered a couple drinks, played the few working games (most were broken and a few stopped working while we were playing).  Not a huge fan of duck pin bowling, but if you are into that they really have a great set up.  This place would be a lot better without so many little kids running around.  They should do an adult only.  Only stayed about 30min.
Was such a cool place to have a lot of fun! I'll be back for sure.
Didn't order any food, but this was a great place. Alot of old school arcade games, pinball, Ping pong, and other activities. Highly recommended.
This place is awesome. Lot of fun games to play and entertainment

The drinks were tasty, the atmosphere was amazing and slide/jenga is the most fun you will have if you give it a try!
The video games were  nostalgic. Wish one was closer to me in Toledo OH.

Didn't rate food as we did not order any
Came here for the first time tonight and had so much fun! Catie at "The Cage" was amazing! Great service.

Always a laid-back little vibe. Very family friendly in the daytime. Only real downfall is the lack of parking, but that could be any venue in the South End.

They usually have good music playing on the weekends and sometimes, you'll catch a DJ. We typically pregame here, but you could enjoy a full night of fun if you choose!
Very fun atmosphere but the drinks are a scam. On average you will be paying around $20 for a drink. Charging stadium prices in a bar is insane.
Bartender Jess is the best!
Such a fun place. Lots of games and outdoor space. No food is served here but they do have a bar for drinks.
Such a fun place to hang out. Good beverages. Even has swings outside!
Cool spot for games and a 10/10 patio. Great hangout space for groups. I will say, I had 2 cocktails, and neither was very good. But the vibe and all else was solid!

Fun place to enjoy an afternoon drink. Lots of outdoor space and a huge indoor area full of games. Cocktails were dynamite! Some families with kids on a weekend afternoon but mostly 20-somethings outside of that. There were a couple of food trucks in the parking lot. It was a fun vibe but I'm not into bar games so I probably won't return. Cocktails, service, and outdoor space were high points.
I loved this place. Enjoy my time here. I was here for a corporate event, we all had a great time. There are many other games to do, and other activities that keeps a big group active.

We had such a great time!!! Only downside was no food served but that's what the food trucks outside were for. Drinks were great! Bartenders make it easy to put in orders wherever you are. Got a lane for duckpin bowling which is so fun!!! Much smaller ball and the shots per frame. The pins have ropes going up so they will fall over but when it resets it clears the knocked pins the rope retracts and sets the unknocked pins back up and keep the ones you hit up out of the way. Slides, swings, giant beer pong made it feel like a big ol playground. So much fun! Definitely recommend!!
Great drinks and great music. Lots of fun's games to play. Wish they offered food.
After a very long bikeride, we stumbled upon this gem. This place was so cool! The swings on a beautiful summer night were the highlight of my evening
Fun time for adults late at night. I went on a weekday and had a blast!

We took this Saturday to scout out a good location for my husbands 40th. Let me say this place has it all , you'll feel like a kid again. Free games , a ton of yummy cocktails ( Carrie Fisher was my favorite) the atmosphere is fun for all ages!
Played a few games and had some drinks. Cool place to hang out and have fun.

Loved this place but tonight when I went the blonde bartender at the front bar was extremely rude and seemed annoyed that people were wanting to order drinks... not very enthused to come back if thats how the bartenders treat customers.

It was $13-$15 per mixed drink in a small glass. They at least taste good, but I didn't even get a buzz from it. Some of the more vintage pinball machines are free to play, which is nice. Though it's $1.00 for every game of Pinball. Every game. It gets expensive, fast. Probably won't go back.

BEWARE!!! A bartender stole from me when I visited here. I ordered a drink and he did not give me the pin pad to select a tip or receipt. I thought that it wasn't required until later that night, when the pin pad was given to me to select for a tip and receipt when I ordered from a different bartender. I checked my bank account later on in the evening and I was charged way more for the one drink than the other. Could've been a mistake, but it also happened to my other friend, and I emailed corporate who gave me the receipt. The bartender ADDED HIS OWN TIP IN. He took advantage of me and also likely my other friend I was with, as she was also overcharged. Absolutely awful to have to worry about a bartender stealing from you. Be careful and make sure to see the pin pad and ask for a receipt when ordering here, and check your bank account afterwards!! Not sure if it's just the one bartender or maybe others do it too. Unacceptable and outright ridiculous. It's by definition stealing from your customers. Thank you corporate for taking care of this and giving me a refund on my tip, as well as ensuring that the situation will be handled, but it's not even about the money, it's about a bartender stealing because he thinks he can take advantage. Just putting this out there to warn others!! Saw another review from a bit ago that said something similar too. As someone who worked in the service industry, I understand tipping very well, and TAKING YOUR OWN IS STEALING!!!!

We held a company event at this location for ~15 people.  Service was good.  Our employees had a great time.  Good venue for this type of an event.  One complaint though...when we looked at our bill afterwards, there was a 3% "entertainment fee".  Now it's 100% on us as we signed the check.  We inquired about the charge afterwards and were told "The entertainment fee is a 3% charge that is added to all of our tabs, It is used for routine up-keep of all of our free arcade games, and other games in the space".  This is just a poor way of doing business.  Those items that were listed are a cost of doing business.  Very poor form charging your customers an additional 3% for this.
We had a great time. Great place for young adults and kids!

This place is AMAZING! Theres swings outside, everyone was friendly, a slide, great drinks.

The ski ball was free, duck-pin bowling was relatively cheap (I believe $10?) and lots of open games. Pinball was $1 per game. Despite a lot of people, we were able to go through the place comfortably. Great place to get a drink and hangout, was a TON of fun!!!
Great when you have a mid to large group as there are several things to do here. Activities such as duckpin bowling, arcade games, ping pong, jenga etc. Can get very crowded during weekends.

Cool place. Was very busy when we were there on a Saturday afternoon.  Some of the arcade games weren't functional. We got on the list for bowling and we're told an hour wait. 2 hours later we asked and we're told we were next... 20 minutes later we went next door for dinner and still never recieved a text or call that our lane was ready so we left. That is really our only complaint. We will try again.
Really dope/fun very enjoyable

TJ is an exceptionally talented bartender whose passion for crafting cocktails is evident in every drink he serves. His expertise and creativity shine through in the unique and delicious beverages he creates, making each visit to the bar a memorable experience. TJ's knowledge of spirits and mixology is impressive, and he's always willing to share recommendations or tailor a drink to your preferences. Beyond his skill behind the bar, TJ's friendly and welcoming demeanor makes everyone feel at home. Whether you're a regular or a first-time visitor, TJ ensures your experience is top-notch with his attentive service and engaging conversation. His dedication to his craft and his ability to create a warm, inviting atmosphere truly set him apart as a bartender.
Love  the vibe here, except there is frequently  WAY too many unattended children. It's a bar and doesnt serve food so not sure why there are more kids than adults here
Muy buen lugar con muchos juegos y cervezas

We visited Pins Charlotte last week and had an incredible time. My girlfriends ring flew into the skee ball machine and we thought we were never going to see it again. Fast forward a couple of days later, Sylvia from Pins called us back and her and the game tech had found the ring in the machine and is mailing it back to us in Massachusetts. Sylvia and Pins went above and beyond to help us, and Pins now has a customer for life any time that we're in Charlotte!
Great fun
Great experience. Great for families with kids
Cool place. I had my birthday here. Great games!
Such a fun place for adults and families. Our family played the arcade games and duck pin bowling. My son loved the large slide and swings.
Place is great. Parking kinda sucks.

Staff was nice and cordial, but there are a number of logistical problems with this place.  1) They sacrifice a quarter of their parking lot to reserve spots for food trucks.  I'm not talking when trucks are there, but off peak times when there are no food trucks there and the parking could be useful.  2) Most machines require quarters or singles. Not a problem, I'll go break a $100 at the bar and get a drink and change.  Nope, bar is cashless.  Ok, I'll go to the rental desk.  Nope, we only have singles. Well, then obviously the change machines take credit cards.  Nope, you have to use the ATM to get a bill small enough for the change machine.  Naturally the change machine next to the ATM is broken, so I have to go to the furthest spot in the arcade from that point to get quarters. 3) None of the newer pinball machines are leveled/tuned correctly, nor are they online, even though they have the equipment to do so. 4) Arcades are not well maintained (joysticks reading inputs incorrectly, falling apart, etc.).

There are other activities to do around the bar and they look fun.  I guess most people are satisfied with those, but when half of your floor space is dedicated to pins and arcade games, I would expect better care to be given to that part of the business.  However, I did notice they said all quarter drops go to Ronald McDonald, so maybe they don't care as much about that since it doesn't appear to be a revenue stream.
10/10 recommend. Not a single negative thought. They have the best cocktails I have ever tired. My kids had a blast.

I call this the adult playground. They ha e pinball machines,  all the classic arcades games,  and most of them are free,  Skeeball,  Pong,  Air Hockey,  Foosball,  Jenga and a host of other games. I think there are 3 games which cost to play. They also serve drinks and there is always a food truck outside. It's a great place for families during the day,  as they have swings,  firepits and a two-story sliding board. The only thing I don't like is the restroom setup. We are in a different climate in the world. There is street parking and a small parking lot down the street.

Seems you can take kids only till 9 pm and then it's only adults. So I couldn't go in but it seemed to be happening
from outside...
Great day out. Free (donation if you like) arcade games and skee ball, and the duck pin bowling was fun too.
A good place to spend the weekend and play some games! Love the ping pong  table as well!!

So. Much. Fun

Great place to hang out and play games and drink wonderful cocktails.
I was at Pins and the Service was amazing! Mackenzie was super friendly and encouraged safe drinking :) will he coming back because of her
Drinks are good, the Game Over drink is definitely worth the 19 dollars if you want a buzz off of one drink, alot of the other drinks are quite small.
Fun night out, I had no idea that places like this still existed. Fun for a couple or a party.
Felt like a kid again!!!
Love the space and the free games!! Will definitely be back

The company I work for had our Christmas party here and it was amazing!! The customer service throughout the entire process from booking the event, prompt response answering questions up to the event, helping setup day of the party and of course the server and amount of fun wr had was 5 stars! 10/10 recommend this place for a fun adult social event.
Had such a great time here with my husband. Loved the arcade games and bowling was so much fun! Will definitely come back.
I took my kids and grandkids here. We all agreed that the music was extremely loud. When you have to shout to speak, it's not a good thing. We left to save our hearing.
The Bowling Was Fun !
Fun place enjoyed with the family even took my dog
My first time coming here, very nice establishment. Had a great time with the family. Will come back, Had a blast bowling.
Nice vibe
They let you bring your own food in. They got bars everywhere and plenty of stuff to do for kids. Kids have to leave at 9pm. But I know how to finesse the miniature bowling if you need a tip
Great atmosphere! Games are great!
Riley's red hits had fire hot dogs
Fun place for mechanical bowling, pong and several other activities. Good beer selection. Did not eat but looks like bar type food
Went here for a Christmas get together. Had a really fun time (saying a lot for my antisocial self). 2 hours of fun went by real fast. I had a mocktail. It was good. But would love a wider range.

Very cool place to play retro games and hang. The pinball games are $1.00 to play. They had a food truck out front but I didn't know they sold food in the inside. Some people had food catered in there.
Great service
Dope atmosphere. Great place to meet up with friends to catch up and have a great time.
If your looking for a great Date Night or just a night out with your friends this is the place . This is what Charlotte has been missing .
Spent a delightful afternoon in the company of close friends, immersed in engaging conversations and games.

I really enjoyed this spot. They offered a good assortment of drinks and the atmosphere was vibrant, yet laid back. The games and slide provide a sense of nostalgia, and I loved the swings! Swinging was one of my favorite things to do as a kid! Will def go again!
Great time, came early with teen son, retro games, swings, slides, fire pit, outdoor games, will be back soon

Worst customer service I've ever had. I tried to go in with a friend who forgot their ID and was turned away. I had mine. We walked back to the car but then my friend decided be wanted to walk in by himself and no one bat an eye. When I tried to go in after just to use the bathroom, a worker said I could use the other side but was denied entry on that other side as they were "closed" while my friend was still inside. I was told that the other worker "lied" about being able to use this bathroom.

I'm from New England and I've never had this happen to me. Almost every place I've been to in New England allows you to use the bathroom especially when the place is still open. They're also consistent about checking IDs. This is ridiculous and you all should be ashamed. This happened at approximately 2 am. I will not be returning and will be sure to make sure friends and family and the readers who read my reviews avoid this type of place. Consistency is key.
Our bartender was great! We enjoyed the duckpin bowling. It was a blast playing the old school arcade games and pinball! They literally have all the games you can think of...it's an adult playground!
I had fun but some of the games need the controls worked on. However, they are free! Staff was friendly.

Absolutely fantastic bar! There's so much stuff to do here it's unbelievable. Giant jenga, duckpin bowling, free skeeball, free arcade machines, a beautiful patio with cozy fireplaces, ping pong. If I were to try to list all the fun activities you could do here this review would be a five page essay.
The drinks are fantastic as well. No food offered by the bar, but they often have food trucks, and there's plenty of great eats nearby too so that's not even an issue.
Great place to hang out. Nice staffs.

We had a blast! Lots of fun games, mostly cheap or free. We didn't get to duckpin bowling as there was a wait, but did almost everything else and definitely spent at least a few hours there. Would go back.
Lots of activities.
Cool place worth checking out
A really nice social place where you can meet new people , drink and play games. The music isn't too loud and most people are open to talking. Had some girls buy me a shot. Ha it was great.

Was here for their Smash tournament they have on Mondays and had a great time! Fun drinks, and they allow outside food so you have a huge selection of great restaurants nearby. Lots of fun stuff to do for adults and kids! I am very excited to make coming here part of my weekly routine.
First experienced Pins Co yesterday. It was a wonderful experience and I highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun experience with family/friends in downtown Charlotte!
Awesome place that was very accommodating for an event! Very spacious and has plenty of activities for everyone, very thankful to Pins for allowing so much space. Thank you!
Just a cool place to hang in Charlotte.

The best arcade for adults! Not all the games are free but even the free ones were fun to play (old arcade games and jenga). The drinks were pretty good, and the service was awesome. There was an upstairs that lead to another bar and a see saw lol.  There were a few food trucks outside for a quick bite as well. It's perfect for a date night or to hang out with friends.

Lots of fun for the hole family.
Duck pin bowling and plenty of arcade game.
Out side sitting area with swings and a fire pit.
Friendly & great atmosphere
Fun spot

Tons of fun for bowling and drinks, but do NOT come here for pinball. As a huge pinball person, I was extremely disappointed because every single table I went to had pretty big issues. $1 per game and badly maintained games? Nope. Lots of arcade games to play instead though.
Always fun.
Fun for the kids for sure.  Not having food though makes things a bit of a pain.  The food trucks are good if they are there but it's hit or miss.  Servers are nice for the most part.
